items.title: Cheese Plate
items.descript: Cashew brie, smoked pecan asiago, and walnut cheddar served with assorted sliced vegetables, pumpkin seed crackers, mustard cream, and an apricot, date, and sage chutney.

items.title: Fresh Tomato Flatbread
items.descript: A crispy flax and carrot crust topped with a basil and walnut pesto, almond ricotta, and fresh tomato.

items.title: Snow Pea Salad
items.descript: With carrots, cucumber, red cabbage, kelp noodles, and fresh basil. Tossed in a lime and sesame dressing.

items.title: Avocado Maki Roll
items.descript: Nori, cashew and cauliflower rice, and fresh avocado. Served with a coconut amino and red chili sauce.

items.title: Sweet Pepper Ravioli
items.descript: Zucchini pasta filled with cashew & red pepper cheese. Topped with a sweet pepper and sundried tomato sauce.

items.title: Thai Style Mung Bean and Edamame Noodles
items.descript: Thinly sliced carrots, zucchini, snow peas, basil, mint, spinach, and broccoli. In a sweet and spicy sauce and topped with crushed pepitas and sesame seeds.

items.title: Wild Mushroom Flatbread
items.descript: Topped with an herb and pumpkin seed pesto, semi dehydrated mushrooms, white truffle-infused extra virgin olive oil, cashew and almond cheese, and fresh spinach.

items.title: Triple Layer Lasagna
items.descript: Flax noodles filled with almond ricotta, thinly sliced zucchini, walnut and basil pesto, and a sundried tomato sauce. Topped with cashew parmesan.

items.title: Tomato Tart Trio
items.descript: Three almond and chia seed crusts filled with cashew cheese and three varied tomato chutneys: Sungold tomato, carrot, and curry spices; Green zebra tomato, spinach, and white pepper; and Beefsteak/heart tomato, ancho chili, and allspice.

items.title: Mushroom Heaven Bowl
items.descript: Shiitake, portobello, and oyster mushrooms, wakame seaweed, chopped kale, and shredded carrots. Topped with roasted peanuts and served with a tahini and garlic dressing.

items.title: Green Garden Bowl
items.descript: Spinach, kale, snow peas, cucumber, green pepper, shredded brussel sprouts, avocado, wakame seaweed, and edamame. Served with a spinach and lemon dressing.

items.title: Health Nut Bowl
items.descript: Kidney beans, broccoli, carrots, zucchini, kale, almonds, cashews, pumpkin seeds, and sunflower seeds. Served with a maple syrup and peanut dressing.

items.title: Rainbow Bowl
items.descript: Shredded beets, tomatoes, carrots, cucumber, red pepper, spinach, red cabbage, kale, sunflower seeds, and avocado. Served with a balsamic and roasted red pepper dressing.

items.title: Ginger Peach Cheesecake
items.descript: Cashew-based cheesecake with a walnut and coconut crust. Topped with chai spice-infused agave.

items.title: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
items.descript: Served with a pecan and cacao brownie, vanilla cream, and fresh berries.

items.title: Lemon Cream Pie
items.descript: Lemony cashew cream filling on a coconut crust and garnished with lemon peel candied in coconut sugar.

items.title: Sorbet Trio
items.descript: Chocolate almond ice cream, blackberry hibiscus sorbet, and strawberry rose ice cream.
